style.name: Style 19 3rd

.oxi-image-hover-wrapper-271 .oxi-addons-row .oxi-image-hover-style *{-webkit-transition: all .5s ease-in-out; -moz-transition: all .5s ease-in-out; transition: all .5s ease-in-out;}.oxi-image-hover-wrapper-271 .oxi-addons-row .oxi-image-hover-style-caption{max-width:300px;}.oxi-image-hover-wrapper-271 .oxi-addons-row .oxi-image-hover-style{padding:10px 10px 10px 10px;}.oxi-image-hover-wrapper-271 .oxi-addons-row .oxi-image-caption-hover,
